profile.description: Richard Pieris Exports PLC is a Sri Lanka-based company, which is engaged in the manufacture and export of rubber-based products. The Company also supplies fillers to the rubber industry. The Company's segments are Minerals, Latex Based and Hard Rubber. The Company is an exporter of industrial rubber mats, jar sealing rings and crutch tips to the international markets in natural and synthetic rubber. The Company's subsidiaries include Richard Pieris Natural Foams Ltd., which is a manufacturer and exporter of latex foam blocks, sheets and pillows using natural rubber latex, and Micro Minerals (Pvt) Ltd., which processes mineral products that are an essential raw material in the polymer industry. The Company supplies its products to the United States, European and the Asia Pacific markets.
